response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value to you, I understand it might be worth $15,000 to you. Considering the quality and the impact this product can have on your business, I am offering it to you for $14,000. This price not only represents a significant saving for you but also ensures a fair transaction for us. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our top-notch product.", "product_price": 14000}
